participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Friendly and supportive, loves sports and family activities.
participant_1.background: coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, enjoys nightlife and the excitement of city life.
